newsitem.title: USA: Medicus says suspends quarterly dividend.
newsitem.headline: Medicus says suspends quarterly dividend.

text.p: Medicus Systems Corp said it suspended its quarterly dividend indefinitely.
The healthcare information management systems concern said it last paid a dividend in May of $0.03 per share.
"The board of directors has determined not to pay dividends on the common stock for the foreseeable future," the company said Tuesday in a statement.

Medicus also said it took a $4.7 million restructuring charge in the fourth quarter ended May 31. The company reported a loss for the fiscal year of $0.57 per share after the charge, compared to a profit in the prior fiscal year of $0.45 per share.
